definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out

sentences.english: The tilting characteristics of slip shoe pair is analyzed through experimental research.
sentences.chinese: 對滑靴副傾側特性進行了分析。

sentences.english: Keep the steel sheets in balance in the hold. Otherwise the ship will be listing.
sentences.chinese: 保持鐵頁在艙內平衡，否則船要傾側的。

sentences.english: He tilted the barrel so as to empty it.
The boat heeled over in the storm.
The trunk of the old tree is slightly inclined, after being buffered by wind and rain for many years.
sentences.chinese: 歷經多年的風吹雨打，老樹的軀幹有些傾側了。

sentences.english: He tilted the car (up) to empty it.
He tilted the car ( up ) to empty it .
Their ship was put into port to careen and refit.
sentences.chinese: 他們的輪船被送入港口傾側待修。

sentences.english: Furthermore, please put more cargo one the port side because the ship is listing to the starboard side now.
sentences.chinese: 而且，請在左弦裝多些貨，因爲現在船向右弦傾側了。

sentences.english: The boat gave a lurch to starboard.
